summary: Experienced software engineer with 5+ years of expertise in full-stack development, specializing in React, TypeScript, and Node.js. Proven track record of leading cross-functional teams and delivering scalable web applications serving 100K+ daily active users.

experience.description:
• Led development of scalable web applications using React and Node.js
• Architected microservices serving 100K+ daily active users
• Mentored team of 5 engineers and improved code quality by 40%

• Developed and maintained frontend applications using React and Redux
• Collaborated with design team to implement responsive UI components
• Reduced page load time by 30% through optimization

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
